meanings.definition: The state or quality of being unproductive.
meanings.sent1: Her nonproductivenesses at work led to her falling behind on her tasks.
meanings.sent2: The team's nonproductivenesses was evident in their failure to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The nonproductivenesses of the lazy cat was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The nonproductivenesses of the old machine was like a rusty cog in a well-oiled system.
meanings.sent5: The nonproductivenesses of the barren land painted a picture of wasted potential.

meanings.sent1: The nonproductivenesses of the meeting was frustrating for everyone involved.
meanings.sent2: The nonproductivenesses of the new software was a setback for the company.
meanings.sent3: The nonproductivenesses of the broken clock provided some comic relief in the office.
meanings.sent4: The nonproductivenesses of the dull knife made cutting vegetables a tedious task.
meanings.sent5: The nonproductivenesses of the leaky faucet wasted water and money.
